work-item.field:
Your newly created requirements now need to e planned for a release so project managers know which item has been planned and also implemtend in which release.
  • Open release "Version 1.0" and add your newly created requirements to existing plan
    (DonÂ´t forget to save your plan after adding your items)
  • By default your requirements have a priority of 50. Increase priority of your new requirments so they are on top of your release backlog.
  • Verify Statistics, Child Plans and Planned items are displayed correctly (your requirements should be on top of your backlog)
  • Set release to "In Progress" and refresh your plan to start calculation of your plan
Hint: You can use drag and drop or arrow / plus keys to increase / decrease or add / remove your items
Add Requirements to release and prioritize
